text: Guy Ravier (born 29 November 1937) is a French politician. ==Early life== Guy Ravier was born on November 29, 1937 in Avignon.National Assembly: Guy Ravier ==Career== He served as a member of the National Assembly from 1988 to 1993. He was also the Mayor of his hometown, Avignon, from 1989 to 1995.Judith Perrignon, A Avignon, la gauche joue un vaudeville, le RPR et l'UDF une tragédie, Libération, June 10, 1995 ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:People from Avignon Category:Politicians from Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 9th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Mayors of Avignon
